string.name: name
string.value: Learning to Speak the Kitty Language

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
Where's the #bBoss Kitty#k that stole Orange Marble?

I went up to the #bBoss Kitty#k and asked something, only to hear some language I've never even heard of in my life. I better ask #bScarred Kitty#k for some kitty language, then I may be able to pick up on it.
I learned the kitty language through #bThe Scarred Kitty#k! Now I can probably communicate with #bBoss Kitty#k.

Did something happen? Meow~ That's the Boss Kitty you're talking about, meow~ The Boss probably tried to say something to you, meow~ Maybe I should teach you some kitty language~ But remember, even kitty language has dialects, and you may only communicate with the kitties in this town, okay? Meow!
Don't you need to speak to Kitty first to learn the Kitty language?
